com.aston.group.stationdefender.gamesetting.items

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group.stationdefender.gamesetting.items.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ItemBandages, ItemBlank, ItemBricks, ItemBricksBlockade, ItemCement, ItemCloseCombatWeapon, ItemCredit, ItemHealth, ItemMine, ItemTurret, ItemWater, ItemWoodenBlockade, ItemWoodenBlocks

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Item class represents an in-game item that the player can pick up, buy for credits, and use
